comments.body:
Would be nice to make is as fancy as the scalac version:

```
Welcome to Scala 2.12.2 (Java HotSpot(TM) 64-Bit Server VM, Java 1.8.0_131).
Type in expressions for evaluation. Or try :help.

scala> object O
defined object O

scala> import O._
import O._

scala> :imports
 1) import java.lang._             (118 types, 124 terms)
 2) import scala._                 (178 types, 172 terms)
 3) import scala.Predef._          (20 types, 136 terms, 69 are implicit)
 4) import O._                     (21 terms)

scala> :quit
```

We can probably make a low hanging fruit issue out of that
